T02TD1806E:114b-1: aa bhi bo dhi kra ma au pa de sha /
T02TD1806E:114b-3: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i man ngag /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1806E:114b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD1806E:114b-5: mngon par byang chub rim bshad bya //
T02TD1806E:114b-6: thub pa chen pos chos rnams ni //
T02TD1806E:114b-7: brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa las //
T02TD1806E:114b-8: mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1806E:114b-9: snying po las kyang snying por gsungs //
T02TD1806E:114b-10: mngon par byang chub rnam gnyis te //
T02TD1806E:114b-11: phyi dang nang gi zhes su bshad //
T02TD1806E:114b-12: phyi ni mdo sde rnal 'byor rgyud //
T02TD1806E:114b-13: thub pa mi g-yo la zhugs la //
T02TD1806E:114b-14: rgyal ba kun gyis 'di skad bskul //
T02TD1806E:114b-15: 'dis ni mthar thug mi thob ste //
T02TD1806E:114b-16: nam mkha'i dkyil ltar mchog gyur pa //
T02TD1806E:114b-17: 'od gsal ba yi gnas thob nas //
T02TD1806E:114b-19: de ltar thams cad stong bsgoms pas //
T02TD1806E:114b-20: byang chub snying por mngon na sangs rgyas //
T02TD1806E:114b-21: byang chub sems dpa' don grub la //
T02TD1806E:114b-22: rigs bzhi'i bde bar gshegs pa yis //
T02TD1806E:114b-23: mngon par byang chub lnga brtags pas //
T02TD1806E:114b-24: de bzhin byang chub sems lnga bsgoms pas //
T02TD1806E:114b-25: 'og min gnas dang ri rab rtser //
T02TD1806E:114b-26: rnam par snang mdzad rdor dbyings su //
T02TD1806E:114b-27: mngon par sangs rgyas phyi yi tshul //
T02TD1806E:114b-28: nang ni gsang sngags nang tshul te //
T02TD1806E:114b-29: skye bo 'dod chags can don du //
T02TD1806E:114b-30: bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis //
T02TD1806E:114b-31: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul nyid kyi //
T02TD1806E:114b-32: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te //
T02TD1806E:114b-33: nyid kyis 'khor bsdus gzugs sprul te //
T02TD1806E:114b-34: bde ba'i rnam pa snang ba gsum //
T02TD1806E:114b-35: zil mnan 'od gsal mi rtog pas //
T02TD1806E:114b-36: bdag byin brlab pa'i gzhal yas bskyed //
T02TD1806E:114b-37: sngags kyi bdag por byin brlabs te //
T02TD1806E:114b-38: zhal gsum lta bur dbus su bzhugs //
T02TD1806E:114b-39: chos bshad 'khor rnams rim phyung ba //
T02TD1806E:114b-40: de ni nang gi mngon byang chub //
T02TD1806E:115a-2: phyag rgya mo la rab brten te //
T02TD1806E:115a-3: snang gsum rim myong las 'das pa'o //
T02TD1806E:115a-4: thams cad stong pa'i 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1806E:115a-5: bla ma'i man ngag las rnyed pa //
T02TD1806E:115a-6: de ni nang gi phyi zhes bshad //
T02TD1806E:115a-7: nang gi nang ni phyag rgya bral //
T02TD1806E:115a-8: dang po smig rgyu 'od lnga'i tshul //
T02TD1806E:115a-9: bde ba rtog bral nyams myong gsum //
T02TD1806E:115a-10: gsum po las 'das gsum po nyid //
T02TD1806E:115a-11: thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin dag / bla ma'i man ngag las rnyed pa'o //
T02TD1806E:115a-13: nyams su blang ba'i bsam gtan ni //
T02TD1806E:115a-14: stong pa gsum gyi rnam dag gang //
T02TD1806E:115a-15: 'od gsal thams cad stong pa ste //
T02TD1806E:115a-16: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba //
T02TD1806E:115a-17: lung dang rigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyis //
T02TD1806E:115a-18: gzhigs te 'od gsal bar byas nas //
T02TD1806E:115a-19: phyi nas rang nyid de bzhin byed //
T02TD1806E:115a-20: rjes gzhig rim gyis thun mong ngo //
T02TD1806E:115a-21: mngon par byang chub lnga bsgoms pas //
T02TD1806E:115a-22: de yang rjes 'jug bsam gtan no //
T02TD1806E:115a-23: khyad par rjes 'jug bsam gtan ni //
T02TD1806E:115a-24: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i snang gsum nyid //
T02TD1806E:115a-25: lha yi de nyid sgyu ma'i sku //
T02TD1806E:115a-26: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim du bshad //
T02TD1806E:115a-27: de nyid ril por 'dzin rnams kyis //
T02TD1806E:115a-28: mgo po nas ni rkang pa'i bar //
T02TD1806E:115a-29: ji srid snying gar phyin gyi bar //
T02TD1806E:115a-30: dbugs kyi rlung ni me long la //
T02TD1806E:115a-31: ji ltar kun du thim gyur ltar //
T02TD1806E:115a-32: rnal 'byor yang dag mtha' la 'jug / thams cad stong pa gang yang min //
T02TD1806E:115a-33: ril por 'dzin pa zhes su bshad //
T02TD1806E:115a-34: yang na yang dag snang gsum yin //
T02TD1806E:115a-35: chos bdag med pa'i rigs pa yis //
T02TD1806E:115a-36: gzhigs pa'i sgyu ma'i snang ba gsum //
T02TD1806E:115a-37: de nyid rigs pas yang gzhigs pas //
T02TD1806E:115a-38: 'od gsal thams cad stong pa nyid //
T02TD1806E:115a-39: de nyid rjes gzhig thun mong ngo //
T02TD1806E:115a-40: yang na khyad par snang ba gsum //
T02TD1806E:115a-41: 'byung ba'i rim gyis sgyu ma'i sku //
T02TD1806E:115a-42: smig rgyu lta bu'i yid kyi lus //
T02TD1806E:115a-43: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa nyid //
T02TD1806E:115a-44: mgo bo nas ni rkang pa'i bar //
T02TD1806E:115a-45: snying ga'i bar la snang ba gsum /
T02TD1806E:115a-46: 'dus pa'i thig le'ang je chung nas //
T02TD1806E:115a-47: me long gi ni rang bzhin du //
T02TD1806E:115a-48: mi dmigs 'od gsal thams cad stong //
T02TD1806E:115a-49: ril por 'dzin pa zhes su bshad //
T02TD1806E:115a-50: ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas //
T02TD1806E:115a-51: phyi rol du ni snang mi 'gyur //
T02TD1806E:115a-52: bum pa de nyid bcag gyur na //
T02TD1806E:115b-0: @115b de bzhin bum pa rang lus nyid //
T02TD1806E:115b-1: de nyid mar me lta bu yin //
T02TD1806E:115b-2: bla ma'i zhal gyis legs bcag nas //
T02TD1806E:115b-3: sangs rgyas ye shes gsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD1806E:115b-4: snang ba gsal te mi dmigs la //
T02TD1806E:115b-5: chad par lta bar 'gyur zhe na //
T02TD1806E:115b-6: snang ba mi snang yod med sogs //
T02TD1806E:115b-7: de kun ltos pa'i rigs pa yis //
T02TD1806E:115b-8: snang yod la sogs bsgrubs gyur na //
T02TD1806E:115b-10: snang yod la sogs ma grub na //
T02TD1806E:115b-11: mi snang med sogs ga la 'grub //
T02TD1806E:115b-12: mtha' bral dbus kyang mi dmigs te //
T02TD1806E:115b-13: thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1806E:115b-14: spros pa kun bral gang yang min //
T02TD1806E:115b-15: chad par lta ba ga la yin //
T02TD1806E:115b-16: de yi mtshan nyid yod med dang //
T02TD1806E:115b-17: snang dang mi snang rtag chad sogs //
T02TD1806E:115b-18: pho mo ma ming kha dog dbyibs //
T02TD1806E:115b-19: skyed dang sngags dang sems la dmigs //
T02TD1806E:115b-21: bsod nams gzugs dang sdig gzugs min //
T02TD1806E:115b-22: sku dang yon tan gang yang min //
T02TD1806E:115b-23: brjod pa'i tha snyad kun dang bral //
T02TD1806E:115b-24: ae ma'o kun du bzang po yi //
T02TD1806E:115b-25: rdo rje sku dang gsung thugs sogs //
T02TD1806E:115b-26: skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1806E:115b-27: skye ba dag tu rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1806E:115b-28: skyes pa nyid na skye ba med //
T02TD1806E:115b-29: skyes dang ma skyes gnyis su med //
T02TD1806E:115b-30: dngos po med pa bsgom pa'i dngos //
T02TD1806E:115b-31: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
T02TD1806E:115b-32: de ltar dngos po dngos med pas //
T02TD1806E:115b-33: bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T02TD1806E:115b-34: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba //
T02TD1806E:115b-35: phung po khams dang skye mched dang //
T02TD1806E:115b-36: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1806E:115b-37: chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas //
T02TD1806E:115b-38: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa //
T02TD1806E:115b-39: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1806E:115b-40: dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pas //
T02TD1806E:115b-41: chos dang chos nyid med pa ste //
T02TD1806E:115b-42: nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa //
T02TD1806E:115b-43: byang chub tshul ni brtan pa'o //
T02TD1806E:115b-44: chos rnams thams cad dngos med pas //
T02TD1806E:115b-45: chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs //
T02TD1806E:115b-46: bdag med chos las kung du 'byung //
T02TD1806E:115b-48: ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la //
T02TD1806E:115b-49: ngo bo med de bsgom pa'ang med //
T02TD1806E:115b-50: nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1806E:115b-51: dngos po dag tu rab tu grags //
T02TD1806E:115b-52: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1806E:116a-2: byang chub med cing rtog pa med //
T02TD1806E:116a-4: mngon par byang chub mngon sangs rgyas //
T02TD1806E:116a-5: bdag gi de nyid chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD1806E:116a-6: de bzhin nyid la sogs pa'i tshig / thams cad de yi rnam grangs so //
T02TD1806E:116a-7: sus kyang ma byas ma bcos pa //
T02TD1806E:116a-8: ma bslad mi 'gyur de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1806E:116a-9: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid pas //
T02TD1806E:116a-10: mngon par byang chub ces brjod do //
T02TD1806E:116a-11: de nyid rtogs te mthong sgom tshe //
T02TD1806E:116a-12: gzhan gyi don du lan 'ga' zhig / chu las nya ldang ji bzhin du //
T02TD1806E:116a-13: bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis ni //
T02TD1806E:116a-14: rtsol bas skur bzhengs don mdzad de //
T02TD1806E:116a-15: da dung bden gnyis phra mor snang //
T02TD1806E:116a-16: de nas zung 'jug ye shes skye //
T02TD1806E:116a-17: chos rnams gang la'ang mi bzod dang //
T02TD1806E:116a-18: 'jigs skrag nyam nga'i rtog pa med //
T02TD1806E:116a-19: gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i //
T02TD1806E:116a-20: dbyer med zung du 'jug pa nyid //
T02TD1806E:116a-21: de ltar rtogs pas thams cad de //
T02TD1806E:116a-22: spyod pa'ang de bzhin gnyis med pa'o //
T02TD1806E:116a-23: sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod //
T02TD1806E:116a-25: mi slob zung 'jug chos sku thob //
T02TD1806E:116a-26: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar //
T02TD1806E:116a-27: mi rtog smon lam dbang gis na //
T02TD1806E:116a-28: gzugs sku la sogs yon tan rnams //
T02TD1806E:116a-29: gdul bya dag pa'i ngo la snang //
T02TD1806E:116a-30: ma rungs phyi ma'i dus su ni //
T02TD1806E:116a-31: lung zab man ngag mi bsten par //
T02TD1806E:116a-32: 'thad sgrub rigs pa gtsor byed pas //
T02TD1806E:116a-33: rang rang grub mtha' dam par 'dzin //
T02TD1806E:116a-34: sbas don tsam gyis chog byed cing //
T02TD1806E:116a-35: mthar thug lta ba zab mo la //
T02TD1806E:116a-36: mi mos slar yang sun 'byin byed //
T02TD1806E:116a-37: des ni bdag gzhan don brlag 'gyur //
T02TD1806E:116a-38: glang chen myos pa rang yan ni //
T02TD1806E:116a-39: glang rdzi lcags kyu ldan pa yis //
T02TD1806E:116a-40: glang chen gzhan yang sun 'byin rlag / glang rdzi lcags kyu nyid kyang 'joms //
T02TD1806E:116a-41: de ni rgyal po'i dkor min te //
T02TD1806E:116a-42: rang gzhan gnyis ka'i don rlag byed //
T02TD1806E:116a-43: de bzhin gnyis dang mi ldan pa'i //
T02TD1806E:116a-44: rigs pa'i glang po rang yan gyis //
T02TD1806E:116a-45: gnyis ldan rigs pa'ang sun 'byin zhing //
T02TD1806E:116a-46: gnyis pa nyid kyang 'joms par byed //
T02TD1806E:116a-47: de ni gsang sngags la min te //
T02TD1806E:116a-48: bdag gzhan gsang ba'i don rlag byed //
T02TD1806E:116b-0: seng ge'i @116b gzugs can nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD1806E:116b-1: wa yi tshig gis zab mo yi //
T02TD1806E:116b-2: mnyam nyid gang yang ma yin pa //
T02TD1806E:116b-4: rin chen rdzab tu bsnubs gyur kyang //
T02TD1806E:116b-5: 'od dang yon tan rang snang bzhin //
T02TD1806E:116b-6: mthar thug lta sman rdzas bsnubs kyang //
T02TD1806E:116b-7: rtsal can blo la 'bar zhing snang //
T02TD1806E:116b-9: 'thad sgrub rigs pa gnyis gtso ste //
T02TD1806E:116b-10: 'jig rten grags te gtsor byed pas //
T02TD1806E:116b-11: gong ma'i lung dag mi tshad kyang //
T02TD1806E:116b-12: gsang sngags mthar thug lta dus su //
T02TD1806E:116b-13: yid dang dbang po mngon sum dang //
T02TD1806E:116b-14: rjes su dpag pa mi tshad de //
T02TD1806E:116b-15: lung zab man ngag tshad mar bya //
T02TD1806E:116b-16: gang zhig nga rgyal gyis sbags shing //
T02TD1806E:116b-17: de nyid chos la brnyas byas te //
T02TD1806E:116b-18: yang dag rim pa sun 'byin pa //
T02TD1806E:116b-19: mnar med sems can dmyal bar ltung //
T02TD1806E:116b-20: gang zhig slob dpon smod pa dang //
T02TD1806E:116b-21: theg pa chen po sun 'byin dang //
T02TD1806E:116b-22: mi gang gsang sngags rgyud dag gi / sbyor ba la ni 'phya byed pa //
T02TD1806E:116b-23: des ni dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
T02TD1806E:116b-24: de ni rtag tu gdon gyis 'dzin //
T02TD1806E:116b-25: khab len rdo la lcags 'du ltar //
T02TD1806E:116b-28: phyi mar ngan song gsum mthar ltung //
T02TD1806E:116b-29: dngos po don dam mi shes par //
T02TD1806E:116b-30: phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pas //
T02TD1806E:116b-31: ngan par rtog pa'i rnam rtog gis //
T02TD1806E:116b-32: rin chen sems ni dri mar byas //
T02TD1806E:116b-33: sgyu mar 'dzin la mngon zhen cing //
T02TD1806E:116b-34: don dam phyi rol byas pa yi //
T02TD1806E:116b-35: lta ba dman pa pa rnams kyis //
T02TD1806E:116b-36: bla med byang chub ji ltar thob //
T02TD1806E:116b-37: tha snyad tshig gi nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD1806E:116b-38: bla ma mi bsten bsnyen pa kur med //
T02TD1806E:116b-39: dman pa'i lta ba la mos te //
T02TD1806E:116b-40: sbas gsum lta zhen mi gtong zhing //
T02TD1806E:116b-41: mthar thug don la mi mos te //
T02TD1806E:116b-42: rigs pa gtsor byed shes rab kyis //
T02TD1806E:116b-43: mthar thug zab mo sun 'byin pa //
T02TD1806E:116b-44: de la de nyid bstan mi bya //
T02TD1806E:116b-45: gang zhig bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing//
T02TD1806E:116b-46: thams cad stong pas mi skrag bzod //
T02TD1806E:116b-47: mthar thug don la dad mos la //
T02TD1806E:116b-48: de la bla ma'i drin sbyin bya //
T02TD1806E:116b-49: 'phags pa klu sgrub man ngag la brten nas //
T02TD1806E:116b-50: bdag gis mchog tu gsang ba 'di bshad pas //
T02TD1806E:116b-51: kun gyi kun rdzob bden pa dag gyur nas //
T02TD1806E:117a-0: mthar thug don rtogs byang chub mi @117a * //
T02TD1806E:117a-2: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa'i man ngag rdzogs so /
T02TD1806E:117a-4: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddh'a ka ra barma dang /
T02TD1806E:117a-5: lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur nas zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
